data.name: FocusChangeReason
desc: A combination of these values can be used to specify the reason for a focus change.

items.name: TAB
lines: Focus changed because TAB was pressed.

items.name: CURSOR
lines: Focus changed because Key Left/Right/Up/Down was pressed.

items.name: MNEMONIC
lines: Focus changed because mnemonic key was pressed.

items.name: FORWARD
lines: Changed Focus to the next control.

items.name: BACKWARD
lines: Changed Focus to the previous control.

items.name: AROUND
lines: Changed Focus forward from last to first or backward from first to last.

items.name: UNIQUEMNEMONIC
lines: Focus changed because mnemonic key was pressed and this mnemonic is unique.
